A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: As the fans of \"Star Wars\" grow up\, I'm glad to say so does the franchise.  \"THe Last Jedi\" shows a maturation that is welcome. Luckily\, it also takes a darker\, more menacing tone.  This will likely tick off those who only want space battles and wize-cracks.  This time we get real meat to the story and hopefully it will separate the \"Star  War\" film lovers with the average \"Star Wars\" movie  watcher.
